resources.string: I have always been fascinated by software development from the age of 14, I have been coding since then using Visual Basic, Python, Java, HTML and CSS. And I love mobile phones too. \nThis is a great opportunity to kickstart my career in Mobile App Development combining the two things that I am passionate about.
Android Stack – Java and XML \nWeb Stack – JavaScript, HTML and CSS \nOthers – Python and C
I have a blue belt in Karate, a brown one in Judo, did swimming and Kung-Fu. \nAlso interested in history and psychology.
